data.title: Today's latest from Al Jazeera
data.meta_description: Stay on top of Samoa latest developments on the ground with Al Jazeera’s fact-based news, exclusive video footage, photos and updated maps.
data.text:
Pacific islands are looking to tradition to help address the climate crisis that threatens their existence.

Partnership deal signed by 14 nations follows historic summit at the White House and comes as China extends influence.

The US is looking to reengage in a region where China has been steadily expanding its influence.

Small island nations call for more action on climate change while pledging unity amid growing geopolitical competition.

Small Pacific island nations are gaining attention amid US-China rivalry after years of being overlooked.

Key summit comes as region grapples with the fallout of the COVID-19 pandemic, climate change and US-China rivalry.

Penny Wong to visit the countries days after her Chinese counterpart, as China and Australia vie for regional influence.

Countries such as Vanuatu and Kiribati expected to seek Wang Yi’s support for development and infrastructure.

Leaked document shows China will call for more police, security, and telecom cooperation at upcoming summit with region.

Island nation is the latest country in the Pacific to unearth a local outbreak of COVID-19.

Samoan Prime Minister’s decision to skip recent summit is latest evidence of growing mistrust of Beijing.

Court ruling due on Monday could help resolve political crisis that saw Fiame Naomi Mata’afa sworn in under a tent.
